title: Frontend Developer
description: We're looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to join our team. You'll work with React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS to build beautiful, responsive user interfaces.

title: UX Designer
description: Join our design team to create amazing user experiences. You'll collaborate with product managers and engineers to deliver intuitive interfaces.

title: Backend Engineer Intern
description: Great opportunity for computer science students to gain experience with Node.js, databases, and cloud services.

title: Data Analyst
description: We are looking for a Data Analyst to help us make data-driven decisions. Proficiency in SQL and Python is required.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product development from ideation to launch. Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus.
